Key Match Events: India won by 6 wickets (with 52 balls remaining)
Pre-Game Insights: India are the home favorites and have a lot of pressure to perform
Australia are not a complete team and lack depth in the spin department
Spin is expected to be influential at Chepauk and India are better equipped in that regard
India lost to Australia at the same venue in March, showing that it won't always translate into results
Post-Match Reflections: India captain Rohit Sharma expressed the importance of the World Cup and the pressure of being the home favorites
Australia captain Pat Cummins talked about the excitement of the World Cup and the team's focus on the tournament
Miscellaneous Highlights: The MA Chidambaram Stadium has hosted seven World Cup games, with Australia winning three of them
India and Australia have met 12 times in ODIs since the end of the 2019 World Cup and won six games each
The weather is likely to be muggy, with a forecast maximum of 33 degrees Celsius
